EN

The article features an interview with Dor Eligula from BridgeWise, an AI-powered research firm, where he discusses growth opportunities in Asian markets and the rollout of AI in investment research. He emphasizes the importance of balancing automation with human judgment to ensure accuracy and prevent errors. Additionally, the text includes insights from Brendan Callan, CEO of TRADU, who argues against the current Prop Trading model, citing its over-reliance on fees and loose risk management practices.

Key Points

  • Dor Eligula highlights "blue ocean" growth in Asian markets and the synergy between AI and human analysts
  • BridgeWise focuses on AI-powered research while maintaining human oversight to correct potential errors
  • Brendan Callan criticizes the Prop Trading industry for being too dependent on fees and having insufficient risk controls

Article
